outputs.output_descr: Achievement of HCFC consumption control targets for 2013 and reduction target for 2015 through implementation of Hydrochlorofluorocarbon Phase-out in the Industrial and Commercial Refrigeration and Air Conditioning (ICR) Sector in China

project_descr: Sector Plan for Hydrochlorofluorocarbon (HCFC) Phase-out in Industrial and Commercial Registration and Air Conditioning (ICR) Sector in China (Stage I: compliance with 2013 and 2015 targets)
project_title: Sector Plan for HCFC Phase-out in the ICR Sector
